subject: Automobile Racing
Records and Achievements
Automobiles
Rocket Science and Propulsion
lead_paragraph: Bloodhound, a car powered by jet and rocket engines, is part of a $70 million plan to reach 1,000 m.p.h. and shatter the land speed record, continuing a tradition of British zeal and risk.
snippet: Bloodhound, a car powered by jet and rocket engines, is part of a $70 million plan to reach 1,000 m.p.h. and shatter the land speed record, continuing a tradition of British zeal and risk.
